intro.two: Freelance Web Services For Creative Humans
intro.two-cn: 为创意人士提供高效、经济、自由的 Web 服务
intro.three: Industry standard service agency for web, stores, apps & business systems.
intro.four: Melbourne, Sydney, Geelong freelance e-commerce, web and mobile software application developer.

about.title: about
about.body:
panko is a service agency for the parts that computers can't do.


Our focus is at the intersection of real world products and cutting edge tech. We apply human craft and analysis, combined with AI tools and software engineering best practise, to achieve the optimum system for your business.

Make tech work for you. We have decades of experience in creating digital systems. With that comes the ability to engineer something that works, efficiently and cost effectively.


panko is run by humans, for humans…

Mobile.techie: React native dev experience back to 2018, deploying to stores, push notifications, crashlytics integration
Mobile.creative: We can launch a web or store based mobile app for you, get in touch to see what's possible.

Cloud.techie: AWS Lambda, Cognito, S3, Route 53, Terraform, Cloudfront and more...

E-commerce.creative: Shopify, Squarespace or Wix stores management

Signage.techie: From broadcast design background panko was able to build large screen display software
Signage.creative: Large screen display systems with content management

UX.techie: Undertook design thinking training and systems thinking training, developing rapid prototypes and incorporating fundamentals of behavioural science as part of qualitative as well as quantitative research.
UX.creative: Involving end users directly in the design process, and testing rapid prototypes in a feedback loop can yield some amazing results.

work.title: Bridge Alert
work.description: Firebase storage, Geofencing, Map based routing, Push notifications. Had a lot of fun prototyping, building and testing this React Native app. Launched in 2017 and gained some popularity around Australia.

work.title: Game of life
work.description: Take home coding exercise which panko got a bit carried away with.

work.title: WorkSafe Projects
work.description: Innovation centre was a very educational experience, to go into as a software engineer. Teamed up with service designers and researchers. Interviewed injured workers. Learned the power of the double-diamond, and design workshop synthesis as part of systems thinking. Developed various tools and web apps. This one had a passwordless sign-in using AWS lambda and cognito, and was piloted by the Victorian government, helping the incapacitated in many ways.

work.title: RevitCourse
work.description: Custom-built multi-location course booking system featuring payment gateway integration and PDF certificate generation. With some customisation of the google map styling.

work.title: SLSA Surf Lifesaving Squad
work.description: Teamed up with this cool Sydney agency, and went to what is arguably the best office in Australia, the HQ of SLSA at Bondi Beach. When panko made these games panko decided to focus on some more hardcore software engineering principles. So panko read a lot about MVC design patterns and that was fully utilised throughout the codebase. As the project code scaled it paid dividends even though it felt slower at first.

work.title: Carlton Natural Blonde
work.description: Retro Galaga. Panko had a wicked time smashing out the code for this in 6 days. It needed to be embedded into a larger marketing site. Panko was able to find all the original SFX online. It was not the full game and was not meant to be but it was a lot of fun and panko later hosted it separately with it's own scoreboard API.

work.title: FLUX Clothing
work.description: Panko' first e-commerce site - which took paypal and eWay credit card payments. Can remember that hallelujah moment when the gateway was all wired up correctly. Shopify didn't exist when panko was doing this. Had some rad fun animating components for the FLUX crew.

work.title: MCG Club Songs
work.description: Started to work more on kiosk and touch screen systems. Was commissioned to add a new club song to this installation at the Australian Sports Museum. Early IOT / Electronic messaging gateway work.

work.title: MCG AFL Scoreboard System
work.description: It's not every day you're hired to build a timed interactive scoring system which generates video signals to show large sports stadium crowds. Huge application.

work.title: Milk Skincare
work.description: For the swimming legend Michael's Milk Skincare start up panko was there at the outset, hand-rolled panko's own e-commerce system made with panko's Popcorn CMS. Pre-shopify. As panko's second e-commerce site, it helped to launch this start up. Lessons learned from doing this project are still with panko to this day. Test Coverage anyone?

work.title: Lucky EOS Wires
work.description: Panko was commissioned to make some wireframes for a crypto baccarat game. Later worked on some React FE component layouts for the real game.

intro.two: 为创意人士提供高效、经济、自由的 Web 服务
intro.three: 适用于网络、商店、应用程序和业务系统的行业标准编码服务.
intro.four: 墨尔本、悉尼、吉朗自由电子商务、网络和移动软件应用程序开发人员.

about.title: 关于
about.body:
是一家针对计算机无法完成的零件的服务机构。


我们的重点是现实世界产品和尖端技术的交叉点。我们运用人工技术和分析，结合人工智能工具和软件工程最佳实践，为您的业务实现最佳系统。

让技术为您服务。我们在创建数字系统方面拥有数十年的经验。随之而来的是设计出有效、高效且具有成本效益的东西的能力。

panko 由人类运营，为人类服务…

E-commerce.creative: Shopify、Squarespace 或 Wix 商店管理

Signage.techie: 体育场和酒店场所的广播设计和标牌系统承包商。
Signage.creative: 具有内容管理功能的大屏幕显示系统

work.title: 生命的游戏
work.description: 进行家庭编码练习，我从中获得了很多乐趣。

work.title: 桥梁警报
work.description: Firebase 存储、地理围栏、基于地图的路由、推送通知。有很多有趣的原型设计、构建和测试这个 React Native 应用程序。于 2017 年推出，并在澳大利亚各地获得了一定的知名度。

work.title: Lucky EOS 线框
work.description: Panko 受委托为加密百家乐游戏制作一些线框。后来为真实游戏开发了一些 React FE 组件布局
